New Records: Rohit Sharma became only the 3rd cricketer to get out in the 80s as many as 4 times in a calendar year in ODI cricket.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 87 in 101 balls against England in Lucknow.
India posted 229 for 9 in 50 overs against England.
Rohit Sharma missed his 8th World Cup hundred by 13 runs.
Rohit Sharma's knock of 87 was crucial on a tough pitch in Lucknow.
Rohit Sharma got to his fifty in 66 balls.
Rohit Sharma hit 10 boundaries and 3 sixes in his innings.
Rohit Sharma was caught by Liam Livingstone off Adil Rashid.
Suryakumar Yadav contributed a handy 49 runs.
Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav made useful contributions.
